core_principles: Utilitarian Density: High information density, minimal padding
Native Feel: System fonts, standard OS interactions
Speed: Instant feedback, no layout shifts
Classic Aesthetic: The specific requested Green/Beige theme

typography.font_family_primary: Segoe UI, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif

variants.primary: bg-[#00a884] hover:bg-[#008f6f] text-white px-6 py-2 rounded-[3px] font-medium uppercase text-sm tracking-wide shadow-sm

Input.style: bg-[#f0f2f5] rounded-lg px-4 py-2 text-[15px] placeholder-[#667781] focus:outline-none focus:ring-1 focus:ring-[#00a884] w-full

instructions_to_main_agent: CRITICAL: Use the hex codes provided exactly. Do not improvise colors.
Implement the 'Double Tick' logic: Gray (Sent), Blue (Read).
The Sidebar must be fixed width (approx 400px) on large screens, taking 100% on mobile.
Use the provided 'chat_background_pattern' as a tiled background image for the chat area with opacity 0.4 on top of the beige background (#efeae2).
Headers: The user requested 'Green Header'. Apply bg-[#00a884] to the top strip of the Sidebar AND the Chat Window. Text icons in header should be white.
Ensure the Message Input bar stays at the bottom of the chat window.
Use 'react-icons' (Material Design icons preferably, e.g., MdMoreVert, MdSearch, MdAttachFile) to match WhatsApp style.
Sidebar Contact List: Must show Name (Top), Last Message (Bottom, truncated), Time (Right), Unread Badge (Green circle).
Chat Bubbles: Use SVG shapes or CSS `clip-path` / `border-radius` tricks to create the 'tail' on the bubbles.
Incoming: White bubble, tail on left. Outgoing: Light Green (#d9fdd3), tail on right.
